types.name: family safe
types.description: Fireworks that can be used by children under adult supervision with minimal danger, intended for recreational use during holiday celebrations

types.name: adult
types.description: Fireworks that can be used safely used by adults dangerous if used incorrectly intended for recreational use during holiday celebrations

types.name: commercial
types.description: Fireworks intended for use by licensed professionals during celebrations

types.name: demolition
types.description: Explosives intended for use by demolition specialist

types.name: militia
types.description: Explosives intended for by small militia groups to overthrow local governments

types.name: military
types.description: Explosives used to kill and obliterate life.
